specialAbilities.name: Charge
specialAbilities.description: If the unicorn moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a horn attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 9 (2d8) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 15 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

specialAbilities.name: Innate Spellcasting
specialAbilities.description: The unicorn's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 14). The unicorn can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:

specialAbilities.name: Magic Resistance
specialAbilities.description: The unicorn has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

specialAbilities.name: Magic Weapons
specialAbilities.description: The unicorn's weapon attacks are magical.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The unicorn makes two attacks: one with its hooves and one with its horn.

actions.name: Hooves
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Horn
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Healing Touch
actions.description: The unicorn touches another creature with its horn. The target magically regains 11 (2d8 + 2) hit points. In addition, the touch removes all diseases and neutralizes all poisons afflicting the target.

actions.name: Teleport
actions.description: The unicorn magically teleports itself and up to three willing creatures it can see within 5 feet of it, along with any equipment they are wearing or carrying, to a location the unicorn is familiar with, up to 1 mile away.

legendaryActions.name: The unicorn can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below
legendaryActions.description: Only one legendary action option can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. The unicorn regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

legendaryActions.name: Hooves
legendaryActions.description: The unicorn makes one attack with its hooves.

legendaryActions.name: Shimmering Shield
legendaryActions.description: The unicorn creates a shimmering, magical field around itself or another creature it can see within 60 feet of it. The target gains a +2 bonus to AC until the end of the unicorn's next turn.

legendaryActions.name: Heal Self
legendaryActions.description: The unicorn magically regains 11 (2d8 + 2) hit points.
